name: Mariusz Jan Skobel
profile_summary:
Senior PHP Engineer with 10+ years of experience in software development, specializing in **PHP**, **Laravel**, and cloud-based solutions. Adept in **DevOps**, leveraging tools such as **GitHub Actions**, **Harness**, and **LaunchDarkly** for seamless CI/CD automation. Proven track record in developing SaaS applications with a strong emphasis on **Agile** and **Scrum** methodologies, ensuring efficient project delivery and team collaboration. Experienced in **unit testing**, **code reviews**, and best practices like **OOP** and **SOLID** principles to produce maintainable and high-quality code.
Additionally, I possess a solid foundation in cloud environments and monitoring tools like **New Relic** and **Splunk**. My background includes designing architectures with a focus on security and compliance, ensuring that solutions meet industry standards. Passionate about driving technical excellence and delivering real-world solutions that make a difference.
